title: Whitepaper Release
description: Officially launched our comprehensive Whitepaper, outlining the vision, technology, and future of Dexter City.

title: Smart Contract Developer Onboarding
description: Welcomed a seasoned smart contract developer with extensive experience across ERC-20 blockchains including Ethereum, Solana, and Skale, bolstering our core development team.

title: Enhanced News Integration
description: Added real-time social media monitoring for trading bot updates across Twitter and YouTube

title: UI Performance Improvements
description: Optimized ticker animations and reduced memory usage in news feeds

title: DCA Strategy Presets
description: Introduced conservative and aggressive DCA strategy templates with visual feedback

title: Bug Fixes
description: Fixed MetaMask connection issues and improved error handling for wallet interactions

title: Bot Marketplace Enhancement
description: Added bot cloning functionality and improved search filters in the marketplace

title: Security Updates
description: Enhanced wallet security protocols and added additional validation layers

title: Chart Integration
description: Added real-time price charts with safety order visualization for better strategy planning

title: Major Platform Rewrite
description: Complete platform overhaul with new MetaMask integration and modern UI design

title: Decision to Focus on Smart Contracts
description: Based on insights into Uniswap v4 hooks, we transitioned our development focus to a full-blown smart contract-based bot, expanding beyond our initial Telegram bot concept.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Improved bot execution speed and reduced latency in trade operations

title: Multi-Network Support
description: Added support for Solana network alongside existing Ethereum functionality

title: Initial Telegram Bot Introduction
description: Launched the very first version of our project as a Telegram bot, marking the beginning of our journey.

title: Uniswap v4 Hook Incubator Participation
description: Excited to announce our acceptance into the Uniswap v4 Hook Incubator cohort, commencing in July. This program will further enhance our capabilities with Uniswap v4.
